thread.section_title: Gild Hall, a Thompson Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Fabulous for work or leisure travel
thread.title_full: Fabulous for work or leisure travel - Review of Gild Hall, a Thompson Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: deveriehart
title: Fabulous for work or leisure travel
text: Wonderful property, decorated with taste and style. Amazing restaurant on site (check out the wine list!) and lovely amenities. A special thank you to Mark, Patrick and Max for their professionalism and fantastic hospitality. This is what a hotel should be, and what a Thompson hotel is.
